author: Martyn Herman, Martyn Herman
title: Simona Halep takes positives from Wimbledon cancellation: 'I am now champion for two years'
description: Romanian former world No. 1 defeated Serena Williams in last year's final
content:
Simona Halep is trying to look on the bright side regarding the suspension of the tennis season due to the coronavirus pandemic.
The Romanian former world No. 1 produced a flawless performance to beat Serena Williams in last years final, but this weeks cance… [+1831 chars]
